original_text: and two doors of cypress wood. The two leaves of the one door were folding, and the two leaves of the other door were folding.
korean_text: 그 두 문짝은 잣나무라 이쪽 문짝도 두 짝으로 접게 되었고 저쪽 문짝도 두 짝으로 접게 되었으며

sentences.original_text: and two doors of cypress wood.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 잣나무로 만든 문 두 짝이 있었는데,

sentences.original_text: The two leaves of the one door were folding,
sentences.korean_translation: 한 문의 두 날개는 접히게 되어 있었고,

sentences.original_text: and the two leaves of the other door were folding.
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 문의 두 날개도 접히게 되어 있었다.
